numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Mali is at the bottom of the graph.
2. Indonesia is at the top of the graph.
3. I wonder what determines the responses of different people.
4. I wonder what determines the salaries of different people.
5. I wonder what determines the overall lives of different people.
6. The graph shows what people around me think about their lives.
7. The graph shows which way the lives of people around me are trending.
8. The graph shows the ages of people.
9. The graph shows the opinions of people about life.
10. The graph shows the opinions of people about the world around them.
